title: Jozef Bomba
text:
Jozef Bomba (30 March 1939 – 27 October 2005) was a <a href="Slovakia">Slovak</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> defender. He impressed as a fast sprinter and excellent athletic footballer. During his career he played 279 matches and scored 8 goals at the <a href="Czechoslovak%20First%20League">Czechoslovak First League</a>.
On 1 May 1960, Bomba made his international debut for <a href="Czechoslovakia%20national%20football%20team">Czechoslovakia</a> in the 4–0 home win against <a href="Austria%20national%20football%20team">Austria</a>.
He was a participant of the <a href="1962%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1962 FIFA World Cup</a> for <a href="Czechoslovakia%20national%20football%20team">Czechoslovakia</a> that finished as runners-up but he did not play any match.
